names.english: calm the heart and secure the kidneys pills
names.commonEnglish: Calm the Heart and Secure the Kidneys Pills

actions: Opens the Orifices, vaporizes Phlegm, removes filth, calms the Spirit and disperses Wind.
With Fu Shen, Ren Shen and Yuan Zhi, for forgetfulness and dulled senses.
Calms the Spirit, sedates the Heart and clears the channel joining the Heart and Kidney.
With Fu Shen and Suan Zao Ren, for irritability, disorientation, palpitations, anxiety and insomnia due to Heart Blood Deficiency or Qi Stagnation.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood and calms the Spirit.
With Yuan Zhi, balances the contracting, introverted and dispersing, extroverted manifestations of Spirit to ensure the proper balance of openness and sobriety.
Tonifies Heart Qi and calms the Spirit.
Quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing, stops diarrhea and spermatorrhea, quiets the Spirit and calms and contains Heart Qi.
Tonifies Kidney Yang and astringes Jing.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
Heavily settles and calms the Spirit, calms the Liver, benefits Yin and anchors Floating Yang.

syndromes: Fright and Fear Damaging the Shen

symptoms: Fear of possible disturbance during intercourse
manifestations.pulse: Thready and wiry and maybe weak
